summary: A widowed single mother, raising her violent son alone, finds new hope when a mysterious neighbor inserts herself into their household.
cast: Anne Dorval|Suzanne Clément|Antoine Olivier Pilon|Patrick Huard|Alexandre Goyette|Michèle Lituac|Viviane Pascal|Natalie Hamel-Roy|Isabelle Nélisse|Ted Pluviose|Pierre-Yves Cardinal|Reda Guerinik|Justin Laramée|Sabrina Bisson|Huguette Gervais|Vincent Fafard|Jean-Philippe Baril-Guérard|Dominic Desnoyers|Guenièvre Sandré|Isabeau Blanche|Catherine Brunet|Johanne Garneau|Michael Rudder|Robin-Joël Cool|Guillaume Laurin|Mathieu Dufresne|Stéphane Julien|Julie De Lafrenière|Sylvie Lemay|Danielle Lepine|Jeanne Roux-Cote|Rosalie Fortier|Stéphane Lefebvre|Nancy Bouchard|Mike Chute|Pierre-François Bouffard
title: Mommy
